text.headline: The Life and Legacy of B.B. King
text.text: A timeline of B.B. King's journey from humble beginnings to becoming the King of the Blues.

media.caption: The Legendary BB King and His Guitar Lucille

text.headline: Birth of B.B. King
text.text: Riley B. King is born on a plantation near Itta Bena, Mississippi. He grows up surrounded by gospel music, which influences his later blues style.

media.caption: B.B. King's birthplace marker in Mississippi.

text.headline: Discovers the Blues
text.text: King listens to blues music on the radio for the first time, discovering artists like T-Bone Walker and Lonnie Johnson.

media.caption: King posing with his guitar, which advertised his radio appearance on WDIA out of Mempthis.

text.headline: Records First Hit, 3 o'Clock Blues
text.text: King records 3 o'Clock Blues, which would become his first hit and a live staple throughout his career.

text.headline: Releases 'Live at the Regal'
text.text: King records 'Live at the Regal,' one of the most acclaimed live blues albums of all time, capturing his electrifying stage presence.

media.caption: Cover art for 'Live at the Regal'.

text.headline: 'The Thrill Is Gone' Becomes a Global Hit
text.text: King records 'The Thrill Is Gone,' a Grammy-winning track that becomes his signature song.

media.caption: Cover art for 'The Thrill Is Gone'.

text.headline: Records 'When Love Comes to Town' with U2, Reaching New Audiences
text.text: King recorded 'When Love Comes to Town' with U2 at Sun Records. The song reached number 2 in the US Mainstream Rock Tracks Chart

text.headline: Collaboration with Eric Clapton: 'Riding with the King'
text.text: King collaborates with Eric Clapton on the Grammy-winning album 'Riding with the King,' bringing his blues sound to a new generation.

media.caption: Cover of 'Riding with the King' album with Eric Clapton.

text.headline: Passing of a Legend
text.text: B.B. King passes away at age 89 in Las Vegas, Nevada. His funeral in Indianola, Mississippi, draws fans and musicians from around the world.

media.caption: B.B. King performing in his later years.
